    • makeNewAccount

      public static Account makeNewAccount​(String userName, long score)
      Static method to create a new account and directly add them into the ArrayList. Useful to handle specific account creation.
      Parameters:
      userName - New account's username
      score - New account's score
      Returns:
      Account Returns the new Account created

    • updateFile

      public static void updateFile() throws IOException
      Static void method to update the file, based on the current accounts in the static Account ArrayList.
      Throws:
      IOException - File Not Found

    • readFile

      public static void readFile() throws IOException, Exception
      Static void method to read the currentfile and parse the text into an Account object, to be put in the static ArrayList
      Throws:
      IOException - FileNotFound
      Exception - Error the String List into ArrayList
